thread.title: UK court allows OPCW to test blood samples from poisoned ex-Russian spy

title: UK court allows OPCW to test blood samples from poisoned ex-Russian spy

organizations.name: organisation for the prohibition of chemical weapons
reuters/peter nicholls london’s court of protection

text: March 22, 2018 / 4:23 PM / in an hour UK court allows OPCW to test blood samples from poisoned ex-Russian spy   An English court has given   poisoned ex-Russian spy Sergei Skripal and his daughter for testing by chemical weapons experts, a courts spokesman said on Thursday. People walk past police tape placed around a pub which was visited by former Russian intelligence officer   before they were found on a park bench after being poisoned   19, 2018. REUTERS/Peter Nicholls London’s Court of Protection, which makes decision over the welfare of people who are unable to do so themselves, agreed doctors could take samples from Skripal for examination by inspectors from the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW), the judicial spokesman   Alistair Smout
